articles.content: Juventus will host Milan with a last opportunity to rein in the second-placed side and get the closing stanza to their own season back on track. Two wins in the last twelve games has not only seen Ju… [+3467 chars]

articles.title: Indian Premier League: Jonny Bairstow fires unbeaten century as Punjab Kings chase down 262 in record T20 chase - Sky Sports
articles.description: Jonny Bairstow fired an unbeaten century as Punjab Kings completed the biggest successful run chase in T20 history in eight-wicket win over the Kolkata Knight Riders.
articles.content:
Jonny Bairstow fired an unbeaten century as Punjab Kings completed the highest successful run chase in T20 history in an eight-wicket win over the Kolkata Knight Riders.
